title: How much formula should a 4 month baby take? - Quora

response.answer_text: Check your baby's appetite. Though 90 ml is recommended for 4 months baby but it can go up and down. Better is to check the baby's tummy. Is your baby happy after feeding. This means his stomach is full now. Check parentlane app for more baby growth related queries or tips and advice. Here is a link https://goo.gl/KjavLX.
